inn1.comm: Vaas starts with one on leg stump, that's too straight but Kohli misses the leg glance, the ball hits the pad and rolls past Sangakkara who dives to his left but fails to stop the ball
good length ball angling across the right-hander from over the wicket, Kohli lets it go
good length on off stump, Kohli stays in his crease and defends towards point
too much down leg side once again, another wide, unusually wayward start from Vaas, he's normally super accurate
shot! Too full on middle and leg, Kohli leans forward and flicks the ball firmly off his pads through square leg, terrific timing
tight line and length on middle stump, Kohli gets behind the line and defends from his crease
Vaas pitches the ball around middle stump on a good length and bends the ball back into the right-hander, Kohli tries to work it on the leg side but misses

awful mix up!! Gambhir pushed the good length ball which angled across him towards point, he set off for the single even though the ball went straight to Dilshan, there was no run there and Kohli sent him back, Gambhir was miles out of his crease and had given up, Dilshan took aim but his throw missed the stumps at the batsman's end
Gambhir fends outside off stump but gets beaten by the movement and bounce across him
edged but it falls short! Kulasekara pitches short of a length on off and seams the ball away from the left-hander, Gambhir pushes at it and gets the outside edge which falls short of second slip
played off the pads on the front foot behidn square for a single, that was a bit too straight from Kulasekara
Kohli defends the ball on the up towards cover
short of a length angling into middle stump, Kohli moves forward, uses the angle into him and flicks the ball off his hips behind square

too full on off stump, Kohli strides forward and drives the ball on the up through extra cover, Jayasuriya gives chase from mid-off and pulls the ball in just inside the boundary, there was no back up fielder and Jayasuriya had to run back inside the field of play to throw it back in
Gambhir fends outside off stump but gets beaten by the extra bounce
good length ball outside off stump, Gambhir opens the face to play the ball behind point for a single
Vaas pitches outside leg stump once again and concedes another wide, Sri Lanka have made a ragged start in the field
good length just outside off stump, Kohli takes a confident step forward and defends with the middle of the bat towards cover
good length delivery begins to slant across the right-hander before curving back in, Kohli defends on the front foot with bat close to the front pad
Kohli moves forward and defends on the leg side
Gambhir moves forward, waits for the ball to come to him, and opens the face to play the ball towards point
Gambhir steps out of his crease, moves towards the leg side to make room, and cuts the ball in the air through the vacant gully region, he wasn't in complete control of that
short ball outside off stump, Kohli half-ducks and lets it go
short of a length outside off stump, Kohli drives the ball hard on the up but hits it straight to the fielder at cover
straighter line and length on off and middle, Kohli moves forward and closes the face of guide the ball towards midwicket

could that have been another run out? Kohli got a thick inside edge towards midwicket and set off for the single, Mendis got to the ball quickly and threw at the non-striker's end, a direct hit and Kohli would have been walking back to the dressing room
tighter line and length on middle stump, Kohli defends on the front foot
Kohli moves forward and plays a good length ball from middle stump to midwicket
tight line and length on off stump, Kohli gets on to the front foot and pushes towards cover
Kohli moves forward and across to an over-pitched delivery on off and middle, he whips the ball over wide mid-on and clears the in-field to find the boundary
Kohli moves forward and guides the ball from outside off towards third man
good length on off stump, Gambhir moves forward and defends towards point
banged in short over the stumps and Kohli ducks under it
short of a length on off stump, Kohli defends towards the off side
Kohli gets on to the front foot and tries to drive, he gets an outside edge that rolls through the vacant slip cordon towards the third man boundary
fuller ball on off and middle, Kohli drives firmly off the front foot towards the bowler
nicely placed and timed, Kohli moves forward and drives a good length ball outside off on the up through the gap at cover, he didn't try to hit it too hard
Kulasekara keeps it straight and the batsman defends back to the bowler
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Kohli strides forward to a good length ball which angles across him and pushes it towards cover point
118 kmh, Vaas keeps it wicket to wicket, Kohli defends on the front foot with a straight bat
good length on off stump, Kohli drives the ball firmly off the front foot but can't find the gap at cover

there's a little bit of width offered outside off and Kohli cuts the ball extremely hard behind point, Jayasuriya sprints to his right from third man and dives but the ball goes under him and goes over the boudnary
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Gambhir stays rooted to the crease and tries to fend outside of stump, he gets beaten
Silva dives to his right at gully and makes an excellent save to prevent the single
played off the front foot towards point
short of a length on middle and off, Gambhir moves back and pushes the ball towards mid-off who is a little deep, the batsmen run the single
Kohli moves forward and defends a good length delivery towards square leg
that bouncer is far too high, it soars over Kohli's head and Sangakkara leaps high and grabs it with one hand, well done!
elegant stroke, Kohli moves forward and presents the full face of the bat while driving the ball towards mid-off
Gambhir moves forward and towards the line of the ball and pushes it behind point for a single
driven off the front foot towards point
Kohli strides forward and drives the ball on the up towards short cover, he timed that well but didn't hit it in the gap
good length on middle and off stump, Kohli defends on the front foot towards the bowler

Sri Lanka have scored a run out! Kohli pushed the ball towards mid-on and set off for a risky single, Silva at midwicket anticipated the run and sprinted towards the ball, his pick up was clean and his throw hit the stumps direct at the bowler's end with Kohli a foot short
Gambhir nudges the ball off his pads towards midwicket for a single
cut from the crease towards gully where Silva stops the single
good length delivery slants across the left-hander from over the wicket, Gambhir leans forward and drives the ball towards cover
cut hard this time but straight to point

lbw!! Gambhir looked out of sorts today! He tried to play across the line of a delivery that angled across him and missed, the ball hit him in front of the middle stump, there was no doubt it was going to hit the stumps but it had pitched outside leg stump so Gambhir was unlucky there, the umpire - Tyron, I think it was - raised the finger in a flash
short of a length on off stump, Raina gets behidn the line and defends
played towards cover of the front foot
Yuvraj tries to pull one that isn't too short from outside off and mis-hits it in the air just over mid-on
an appeal for lbw, a full ball swings into the left-hander and hits Yuvraj on the pad, he was across his stumps and off balance but that would have missed leg stump
Vaas strays on to leg stump and Yuvraj flicks the ball off his pads towards long leg, he decides a little late that he wants the second but the throw from the deep is poor
Yuvraj strides forward and defends a good length ball towards point
good length and line on off stump, Yuvraj defends on the front foot towards cover point
played towards midwicket off the front foot
Kulasekara beats the outside edge with one that pitches close to off and seams across the left-hander, Yuvraj fended from his crease and  got squared up a little
defended back to the bowler on the front foot

bizarre shot! Yuvraj moves quickly on to the back foot and pulls the ball, the length isn't that short and all and the ball hardly rises, he manages to pull it flat and it clears the midwicket boundary, terrific timing
pushed off the back foot towards mid-off for a quick single
Raina plays the ball towards cover on the front foot, the off side field is packed
Raina gets behind the line of a ball that moves across him and defends on the off side
tight line and length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Yuvraj gets behind the line, stays in his crease, and defends on the off side
good length on off and middle, Yuvraj punches the ball off the front foot towards cover
Yuvraj drives the ball off the middle of the bat towards cover point, such timing he has, the ball traveled quickly to the fielder
Yuvraj moves back and across and defends a good length ball towards the leg side
full ball on off stump, Yuvraj plays it towards mid-off on the front foot, Vaas completes the first maiden of the match
Raina moves forward and drives a good length ball with a straight bat towards mid-off
Raina moves back and pulls a short ball over wide mid-on, he hasn't timed it well but once the ball clears the in-field it runs to the boundary, that ball got rather big on him
strays down leg side this time, that's a wide
Raina moves forward and defends a good length ball on middle and off with a straight bat
that's high in the air and four! Raina moves back to hook, the ball gets very high on him and he top-edges it down to fine leg, the ball falls safely and goes for a one-bounce four
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a quick single

caught at slip! Yuvraj pushes forward at a delivery which angles across him from a good length, he plays the ball with hard hands and the outside edge flies to Jayawardene who takes it easily at first slip, fantastic bowling from Kulasekara, he's been spot on today and troubled every batsman
Raina defends from his crease at one that angles into him and gets an inside edge on to the pad
Raina gets behind the line, moves across his crease, and defends towards the bowler
Raina moves forward and drives a good length ball towards mid-off
short of a length outside off stump, Raina drives off the back foot towards cover
Raina pushes forward at one outside off stump and gets beaten by the extra bounce, even Sangakkara has trouble collecting that
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
full ball on off stump, driven fluently off the front foot towards mid-off
played off the front foot towards cover, Badrinath is getting a good stride forward
Badrinath moves back and opens the face of the bat to play the ball towards point
Badrinath moves forward and defends a good length ball towards cover
Badrinath moves on to the front foot and defends confidently towards cover
left alone outside off stump, Thushara starts with a maiden over
played off the front foot towards midwicket
Raina jumps back in his crease, gets behind the line, and defends towards the bowler

loud appeal for lbw! Vaas pitches the ball around off and angles it into Raina who moves across his stumps and tries to play across the line, he gets hit in front of the stumps, that was very close, Vaas is super confident, it may have been too high, only just, VirtualEye says it's hitting the top of leg
defended on the front foot on the off side
played off the pad through square leg for a single
Badrinath gets on to the front foot and defends a good length ball towards point, Vaas ends his ninth over
short of a length outside off stump, Raina gets behind the line and defends on the off side
banged in short over the stumps, there's a man out for the hook at long leg, Raina ducks under it this time
short and wide outside off stump, Raina cuts the ball hard towards Vaas at third man
Badrinath cuts the ball from his crease towards point, he's hitting the ball well but not finding the gaps yet
electric fielding! Dilshan moves quickly to his left at point to field Badrinath's firm cut with one hand, he turns around quickly and throws at the stumps at the striker's end
that's far too wide outside off stump, that's the fifth wide of the innings, unless I've lost count!
Badrinath strides forward and uses the width outside off to drive the ball through the gap between point and cover point, there's a fielder in the deep though
short ball outside off stump, Raina stands tall on the back foot and punches the ball hard through cover for four
Raina leans forward and works the ball off his pads towards square leg
Raina moves back and across and defends a good length ball towards the leg side, that was played slightly in the air
Raina gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends towards the bowler with a straight bat
Raina tries to drive off the back foot through cover but Vaas cuts the ball into the right-hander and beats the inside edge of the bat, Raina ends up playing outside the line of the ball
Raina flicks the ball off his pads towards deep square leg, the fielder at long leg runs to his right and fields
driven off the middle of the bat towards mid-off, nicely timed but no placement
Badrinath stays in his crease and opens the face of the bat to guide the ball behind point, Silva throws himself to his left to try and stop the ball but can't reach it
Raina moves across his stumps and defends towards the off side, fuller length from Thushara
Raina moves forward and drives the ball towards point
banged in short, that was in the 130-135 kmh range, Raina moves towards the off and lets it go
banged in short again but this time the line is down leg side
he's bowled another short ball down leg side, Sangakkara collects and begins to applaud but stops once the umpire signals wide once again
good length on off and middle stump, defended towards the bowler
spot on with his first ball on off stump, Badrinath strides forward and defends towards the bowler
Badrinath steers the ball towards third man for a single
tossed up on middle and off stump, Raina moves forward, gets to the pitch of the ball and blocks
he's taken him on! Raina gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps Mendis high over deep midwicket, there's no fielder in the deep, the ball went miles in the air but only just cleared the boundary
strays down leg side, wide called
played off the pads through square leg for one
Badrinath strides forward to a good length ball just outside off and defends on the leg side
short of a length on off stump, Raina stays on the back foot and opens the face to guide the ball behind point for one
Badrinath stays in his crease and uses the width created by the angle across him from over the wicket to cut the ball to third man
Raina moves across his stumps to a short of a length ball which angles into him and tucks the ball towards midwicket
Badrinath strides forward and square drives a good length ball on the up towards point, nice timing once again
Badrinath stays in his crease and plays the square drive once again, he hits it hard into the ground and the ball bounces past point towards third man
Raina nudges the ball from middle stump towards wide mid-on for a single
bowled quickly through the air on leg, Raina moves back and plays the ball to square leg
bowled slower and straighter, Raina defends on the front foot
that was the offbreak and it pitched on leg and spun across Raina who defended on the front foot
pushed towards mid-on for a quick single

caught!! Mendis strikes! Badrinath tries to take Mendis on, he charges and tries to hit over the off side, he gets too far away from the ball and throws his bat at it, he connects with the bottom and hits it flat and straight to Vaas at mid-off
Dhoni pushes forward to defend the off break but gets a bit of an inside edge
short of a length outside off stump, Raina hardly moves his feet while reaching out for the ball to play it to third man, he gets beaten
defended towards midwicket on the back foot
defended from the crease towards point
banged in short of a length and the ball rises sharply on Raina who takes one hand off the bat as he defends on the off side
fuller length outside off stump, Raina moves forward and drives the ball through cover, that was timed well
Raina moves forward to a fuller ball and opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
defended on the front foot towards the off side, Mendis is keeping it on middle stump
Raina lunges forward and pushes the ball towards long off for a single
that was the leg break and Dhoni went back to play the ball from outside off on the leg side, he mis-hit it
defended on the front foot towards the off side
fuller ball outside off stump, Dhoni pushes off the front foot through cover
the off break which pitches on leg and middle, Raina moves back and drives the ball towards midwicket
good length delivery just outside off, Raina moves back and across and opens the face to steer the ball towards point
fuller length but the ball pitches on leg stump and goes further down leg side, Raina moved a long way across his stumps and missed the leg glance
short of a length outside off stump, Raina stays in his crease and cuts the ball in the air and down to third man
Dhoni moves across his stumps and defends the ball towards the bowler
Dhoni moves back to a short of a length ball and defends towards the bowler
Dhoni moves back and opens the face to play the ball to point
Dhoni tries to cut off the back foot but mis-times it towards point
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, Raina leans forward and pushes the ball towards cover point to bring up the 100 for India
slightly short and wide outside off stump, Dhoni moves back, winds up, and cuts the ball fiercely past point, the man on the boundary won't stop that
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
bowled full on middle stump, Dhoni drives past the bowler for a single
slightly slower and shorter, Raina moves back and pushes the ball in front of point for one
Dhoni lunges forward to one that begins to break away from him and defends towards cover point
Raina moves back, waits for the ball to turn across him, and cuts towards point where Kulasekara mis-fields
that's too short and Dhoni moves back to pull the ball through midwicket for  a single
Raina moves deep in his crease and pushes the offbreak through point
that's the quicker one outside off stump and Dhoni was beaten while trying to cut
defended off the front foot towards midwicket
Dhoni leans forward and drives a full ball through cover
Raina began to try and hit over the top but checked his shot and pushed the ball straight in the end
Mendis oversteps and bowls a flat one outside off, Raina pushes through point, he had overstepped by a foot at least!! Free hit coming up.
Dhoni charges down the track, Mendis follows him and cramps the batsman for room, Dhoni swings hard but hits the ball straight to midwicket
the slower off break but the length is too short, Dhoni moves back quickly and pulls the ball wide of the fielder at mid-on for four
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
slightly short outside off once again, Dhoni moves back and generates tremendous power with his bat speed to drive the ball through cover for four more
fuller length on off and middle, driven back to the bowler on the front foot
tossed up from round the wicket to the left-hander, Raina comes forward and plays the ball through cover
over the wicket for the right-hander, Dhoni drives a full ball towards long-off for a single
Raina moves back and across and nudges the ball which angles into him towards midwicket
bowled flatter through the air on off and middle, driven down the ground to long-on off the front foot
Raina lunges forward and defends towards cover
flatter ball pitches outside off stump and turns away from the left-hander, Raina tries to cut off the back foot but mis-times the shot to point
Dhoni moves back and runs the ball fine towards third man
defended on the front foot towards point
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, Dhoni leans forward and pushes the ball through point
Raina comes forward and defends the ball towards leg side
Raina tries to drive down the ground but gets a bit of a thick inside edge towards square leg
Raina goes back and pulls the ball  towards deep square leg
tossed up from round the wicket, pushed off the front foot towards cover
Raina moves back to cut but gets beaten by a flatter ball, it passed under his bat
he's blasted that! Raina comes out of his crease, gets to the pitch of the ball, frees his arms, and slams a flighted delivery through cover for four
pushed through point for  a single
bowled flat through the air across the right-hander from roudn the wicket, defended on the front foot to midwicket
Murali rips the doosra across the right-hander at pace, Dhoni tries to cut but gets beaten
Raina moves back and across and drives towards long on for a single
short ball outside off stump, Dhoni moves back and hits the ball hard with a flat bat to wide long-off
Dhoni moves across his stumps and plays a delicate sweep
Raina stays on the back foot and plays a flat delivery from outside off towards point
Raina moves forward and across to play a ball off his pads behind square
that ball came very slowly off the pitch, Dhoni went back to play the ball and was too early on the shot
Raina leans across his stumps to nudge a ball towards midwicket, he reaches 50 and it has been a sensible innings
played off the back foot behind square leg for  a single
Raina strides forward to defend a flat delivery that angles into him towards cover
Murali bowls it flat outside off, Rain defends towards cover
Raina comes out of his crease, doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, but manages to nudge it towards long on for one
Dhoni drives a full ball straight to the bowler, Raina was backing up and dives to get back to his crease
Raina sweeps behind square, that was too straight from Sanath
Dhoni comes forward to play the ball on the off side, Jayasuriya shortens his length and spins the ball away from the right-hander and beats the bat
driven off the back foot through cover
flicked off the pads towards square leg

massive mix up and Raina is run out!! Dhoni pushed the ball off the front foot towards cover, he set off for the single immediately and Raina responded too, Dilshan ran in quickly towards the ball and that caused Dhoni and Raina to pause, Raina saw Dhoni coming through for the run, he then began to run towards the batsman's end but was caught short by an accurate throw from Dilshan, Sangakkara broke the stumps and they didn't even need the third umpire, I don't think there was a single in that, poor call
driven off the front foot on the off side
defended on the front foot by Sharma who's been woefully out of form
driven off the front foot towards long-off
defended on the back foot on the off side
Dhoni moves back in his crease and cuts the ball through cover point
tossed up on leg stump, Dhoni waits in his crease and plays the ball through square leg
defended back towards the bowler on the front foot
Dhoni comes forward and drives the ball towards Jayasuriya who fails to stop it cleanly
driven off the back foot towards long-on for a single
Dhoni leans forward and drives a flighted delivery towards cover
pushed off the front foot towards cover and Dhoni calls for the quick single, Sharma responds
Sharma defends on the front foot to the fielder who has been placed at silly mid-off
Sharma tries to drive but gets an inside edge on to his pad
Dhoni defends on the front foot to short cover
Dhoni moves back in his crease to gently push a flat ball off his pads to square leg, the fielder has to run in from the deep so Dhoni sprints back for two
tossed up on leg stump, Dhoni flicks off the pads through midwicket
defended on the front foot
Sharma waits in his crease and cuts the doosra towards third man
swept towards deep backward square leg for a single
bowled straight on middle stump, driven off the front foot to long off
Dhoni comes forward and nudges a full ball towards cover point
Sharma hardly moves his feet as he drives a leg break towards extra cover
the length is a bit short and Sharma plays the ball through miwicket
bowled full and straight on middle and off, Dhoni defends on the front foot towards the bowler
played through the covers and the batsmen stroll the single
bowled flat through the air from round the wicket, it was the topspinner, Dhoni defends on the front foot
Dhoni leans forward and pushes the ball towards point for one
tossed up on off and middle from over the wicket, Sharma strides forward and works the ball off his pads through square leg
Dhoni plays the ball through point off the front foot
Sharma moves back and pushes the ball towards midwicket
played down the ground towards long on for a single
played off the front foot towards the off side
Dhoni jumps down the track and gently pushes a flat ball off his pads through square leg
pushed through cover off the front foot
short and wide outside off stump, Dhoni moves back and cuts the ball towards deep cover
defended on the back foot to the bowler
shot! The length was a bit full from Jayasuriya and Sharma went inside out and lofted him cleanly over extra cover for four
Dhoni reaches out for a full ball outside off stump and drills the cover drive through the gap, fantastic timing and placement
Dhoni pushes the ball down the ground towards long on
Sharma gets on to the front foot and drives towards long-off
Murali fires in a quicker and flatter ball on off and middle stump, Dhoni defends back to the bowler
slower and shorter outside off, Dhoni smashes it off the back foot but straight to extra cover
defended on the leg side
Sharma reaches forward to drive a straight ball towards long off
Dhoni reaches out and drives another flat ball to long off
Sharma gets on to the front foot and drives the ball though cover
Dhoni moves back and cuts the flatter ball towards cover
Dhoni goes on to the back foot and plays the ball to the bowler
Dhoni moves back and cuts the ball hard, the fielder at extra cover dives to stop it but pushes the ball away from himself, allowing the second
bowled flat through the air on off stump, driven off the back foot towards long off
flat ball on leg stump, Dhoni tries to force the ball on the leg side but doesn't connect
Dhoni reaches 50 by driving a full ball down the ground, well played but India need him to push on
Sharma moves back and punches the ball off the back foot through cover
Dhoni charges down the track and lofts Murali back over his head, he may not have connected perfectly but the placement was perfect and he'll get four
Dhoni moves back in his crease and cuts the ball late towards the third man boundary for four more!
pushed off the back foot through midwicket
Dhoni reaches out for a flighted delivery and hits the ball hard through cover, India reach 200
Dhoni nudges the ball towards cover for another single
super placement! Sharma wasn't to the pitch of the ball but hit made room to loft the ball inside out into the gap at deep extra cover
Sharma stays on the back foot and drives a flat ball towards mid off
Sharma comes on to the front foot and pushes the ball between midwicket and mid-on
a low full toss on off stump, Sharma plays the ball towards long off on the front foot
Dhoni moves back to a good length ball and pushes it to midwicket
played off the back foot towards long off for a single, that was the slower one from Thushara
full ball just outside off stump, Sharma makes room and squeezes the ball along the ground towards the third man boundary

caught! Sharma comes on to the front foot and tries to loft over the leg side, Thushara bowls a slower one and Sharma is early on the shot, he gets a top edge that goes high in the air towards cover where Kapugedera settles under the catch and judges it well
full toss and Harbhajan plays it off the back foot towards midwicket
pushed on the back foot towards the off side for a single
Harbhajan leans forward and defends an offbreak towards cover
Harbhajan pushes forward at a delivery which moves away from him and gets an outside edge to short third man
width offered outside off stump and Dhoni cuts hard, he places it fine, perhaps it was a bit of an edge, the ball runs towards the third man boundary
Dhoni tries to cut off the back foot but the length is too full, how did that miss off stump? It was mighty close
played off the back foot towards cover

full ball on middle stump, Dhoni goes deep in his crease and drives the ball powerfully through midwicket for four, it was the slower ball and Dhoni cleared his front foot out of the way to hit the ball with tremendous power
another slower one and Dhoni gets beaten, Sangakkara fumbles to allow a bye
full ball in the blockhole, Harbhajan manages to dig it out
full and wide outside off stump, Harbhajan slashes at it and gets an outside edge which runs down towards third man
Dhoni drives a full delivery through cover, he's placed it wide enough of the fielder on the boundary to run two
accurate yorker on middle stump, Dhoni defends on the off side and sets off for the run to retain strike
short of a length and Dhoni cuts off the back foot through point

caught! Harbhajan clears his front foot out of the way and slogs across the line, he didn't get to the pitch of the ball and top-edged it miles it the air, that ball went extremely high but didn't go far at all, Sangakkara ran a few paces to his left and took a well-judged catch

Mendis' day has rapidly got better! He bowls a full and straight ball, Dhoni charges down the track and tries to hit him over the off side, he doesn't get any elevation and hits the ball flat and low towards Jayawardene who tumbles forward while taking the catch at cover

has he got a hat-trick? Zaheer lunged forward to a leg break and lifted his toe off the ground as the ball beat the outside edge, Sangakkara whipped off the bails but Zaheer had just grounded his foot in time
defended on the front foot
Zaheer defends on the off side on the front foot
Praveen moves across his stumps and hits the ball through midwicket, the batsmen run two where there could have been three
bowled wide down leg side and Zaheer sets off quickly from the non-striker's end to steal a run as well, Sangakkara throws the ball at the bowler but Praveen makes his ground
full ball in the block hole outside off, Zaheer swings and misses
that's a high full toss on off stump, not too high though, Zaheer swings hard and gets an outside edge towards third man, he was looking to hit that towards deep midwicket
Zaheer sets off again from the non-striker's end and Praveen gets hit on the pad, thushara throws at the bowler's end but misses, the batsmen run at over throw as well
this time Praveen misses and Zaheer steals another bye, Sangakkara throws the ball to the bowler but Praveen is safe once again
caught! low full toss and Zaheer tries to loft it down the  ground, he slices it high in the air and straight to Murali at extra cover

inn2.comm: Praveen pitches on a good length in line with the stumps and moves the ball away from the left-hander from over the wicket, Jayasuriya waits on the back foot and plays the ball to point
beaten! Praveen pitches short of a length around off stump, hits the seam and moves the ball away from Jayasuriya who fends off the back foot and misses, a few Indians appeal but there was no edge
more movement away from the left-hander, Jayasuriya stays in his crease and defends
pitches on a good length outside off, Jayasuriya lets it go
short of a length but this time there's too much width outside off stump, Jayasuriya frees those powerful forearms and cuts the ball hard past point for four
good length outside off stump, left alone by Jayasuriya
Zaheer pitches on a good length outside off and seams the ball away from Sangakkara who moves forward and lets the ball go
Zaheer pitches on a good length and angles the ball into the left-hander, Sangakkara moves across and defends on the leg side
Sangakkara stays on the back foot and defends a short of a length ball to Sharma at point
he gets a bit too straight with his line and allows Sangakkara the space to move across his stumps and play the ball off his pads towards deep square leg
good length delivery angling into off stump, Jayasuriya leans forward and pushes the ball towards cover, that was around 135 kmh
cleverly placed, Jayasuriya moves back to a short of a length ball and taps it into the gap between extra cover and mid-off
Jayasuriya begins to come down and then defends a good length ball towards cover point
Praveen pitches around leg and seams the ball towards off from a good length, Jayasuriya defends from his crease towards the bowler
Jayasuriya gets on to the front foot and drives a fuller ball towards cover
short and wide outside off stump, the width was there for the cut and Jayasuriya went after it, the ball moved away and beat the bat
again the width is there for the cut and Jayasuriya doesn't miss, he stays in his crease and cuts the ball hard and in the air through the vacant gully region for four

dropped! Praveen gives Jayasuriya too much width outside off again, he comes forward and drives the ball powerfully but in the air towards cover, Kohli was at cover, he went down on his knees for some reason and the ball burst through his hands and sped to the boundary
Sangakkara walks right across his stumps and tries to play the leg glance but misses, the ball passes over leg stump
Sangakkara slashes outside the off stump and gets beaten by a short of a length delivery
short and wide outside off stump, Sangakkara sees the width, gets under the bounce, and cuts it hard over cover point for four, that was a freebie
driven off the front foot towards mid-on
Sangakkara comes forward and outside the line of off stump, Zaheer pitches the ball on a good length outside off and seams it away from the left-hander, Sangakkara pulls out of the shot
Sangakkara pushes towards cover point and wants the single, Jayasuriya sends him back

caught! The short of a length ball pitches around off stump and seams away from the left-hander, the width is there for the cut and Jayasuriya attempts to play it past point off the back foot, the ball seams away from him and takes the edge through to Dhoni, Kohli will be relieved, Praveen is pumped
a good length ball pitches outside off and seams into Kapugedera who lets it go
fantastic shot to get off the mark, he takes a long stride forward and plays the square drive through cover point for four, superbly timed
good length ball on off stump, Kapugedera gets behind the line and defends

Praveen pitches on a good length outside off and seams the ball away from the right-hander this time, he's been moving it into the right-handers (away from the left-handers) all this while, Kapugedera lets it go
Kapugedera watches one seam away from him outside the off stump once again
short and wide outside off stump, awful ball, Sangakkara moves back and smashes the cut through point for four, he had plenty of room to play the shot

lbw! Zaheer pitches the ball on a good length outside off stump and, instead of taking it away from the left-hander, he nips it back into Sangakkara who had moved across his stumps to play the ball, the ball hits the pad just above the knee role in line with off stump, is height a problem? Umpire Doctrove doesn't think so, the ball was similar to the one that bowled him at Dambulla, it hit him on the back foot, it was rather high though even though Sangakkara was on the back foot
he gets off the mark by moving across his stumps and working the ball behind square
left alone outside off stump
defended on the back foot towards the off side
fuller length outside off stump, Kapugedera strides forward and drives firmly towards cover where the fielder dives to his right and gets a hand on it, the effort saves a boundary
Kapugedera moves forward and defends a good length ball towards the leg side
Praveen bangs the ball in short, too short, and it balloons over the batsman's head
this one takes off from just short of a length, Kapugedera moves towards the ball to play it but gets beaten by the extra bounce
good length on off stump, Kapugedera leans forward and pushes towards the leg side, he thinks about the single but Praveen runs quickly and fields
short of a length on leg stump, Kapugedera nudges the ball off the back foot behind square
short and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene stays on the back foot and cuts towards Yuvraj who is on the circle at point
short of a length from Praveen outside off, Kapugedera covers his off stump and lets the ball pass
good length on middle and off, Jayawardene gets behind the line and defends on the off side
excellent ball, Zaheer pitches on a perfect length in line with the stumps and then seams the ball across the right-hander from over the wicket, Jayawardene prods from his crease and gets beaten
and he's beaten Jayawardene once again with a similar ball, it pitches in line with the stumps and seams past the outside edge of Jayawardene's forward push
driven off the front foot towards cover, that wasn't timed well
this time Jayawardene lets the ball that seams across him pass through to Dhoni
Zaheer finishes an excellent maiden over with a good length ball on off stump, Jayawardene drives off the front foot towards cover
left alone outside off stump, Dhoni fumbles but recovers quickly to field the ball and prevent the batsmen from running a bye
supreme shot! Kapugedera plants his foot forward to a length ball which angles into him and lofts it high and far over deep midwicket, it's been dropped but by someone outside the boundary
defended on the front foot to the off side

lbw! Praveen pitches the ball just outside off and angles the ball into the right-hander, Kapugedera moves across his stumps and tries to work the ball off his pads, he misses and gets hit on the top of the front pad, he sets off for the leg bye but is cut short by umpire Tyron who raises his finger in a flash, that looks like it's a bit high, on the other hand replays show it hitting the top of leg stump
defended on the front foot towards the leg side, Silva has placed it in the gap and will get off the mark
wicket-to-wicket line from Praveen, Jayawardene flicks the ball from middle towards long leg
pitches on a good length in line with the stumps, Silva defends towards the off side on the front foot
pitches short of a length and cramps Silva for room, Silva tries to work the ball off his hips but gets hit on the thigh
good length once again and Zaheer seams the ball across the right-hander, Silva lets it go

another lbw! Fantastic bowling from Zaheer! He pitches on a good length in line with the stumps and gets the ball to straighten into the right-hander, Silva plays from his crease and gets hit just above the knee roll, umpire Doctrove doesn't have a problem with the height and raises the finger, replays indicate the ball would have hit the top of middle
he tries to drive a good length ball through the off side and gets an outside edge towards third man
short of a length angling across the right-hander, Jayawardene lets it go
short ball outside off stump, Dilshan smashes it off the back foot towards mid-off where Harbhajan fields and falls over because of the force with which the ball was struck
good length ball angles into the right-hander, flicked off the pads to square leg
short of a length outside off stump, Dilshan tries to pull but mis-times it to mid-on
short of a length and extremely wide outside off stump, Tyron calls it wide
tight line and length on off stump, Dilshan strides forward and blocks

now that's too short just outside off stump and Dilshan gets into position quickly and pulls powerfully through the gap at midwicket, the length was so short that Dilshan had enough time to pull from outside off
that's short again and Dilshan pulls once again in the air over over the infield, the ball bounces once before going over the boundary
good length on middle and off stump, Jayawardene strides forward and defends solidly with bat close to front pad
Jayawardene moves forward and defends the ball towards cover
tight line and length on middle and off stump, defended on the front foot towards the off side
tight line and length around off stump, pushed off the front foot towards point
defended on the front foot towards mid-off, disciplined over so far
short of a length on off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and towards the line of the ball and defends towards point
pitches on middle stump on a good length, he shuffles and tucks it behind square for a single
pitches on a fullish length on off stump, he turns the face of the bat and works it to midwicket
fullish outside off, Jayawardene plays it safe and softly taps it down to mid-off
fires that a little fuller outside off, almost a yorker length, he digs it back to the bowler
hits a good length on off and middle and cramps him for room to score, he taps it to mid-on
and again an excellent line and length, he pushes it down to mid-off
pitches outside leg and skids through quickly, hits him on the pad and rolls away to the off side
very streaky but SL will take it however they come, the ball nips back in and the inside edge just takes it past the stumps and down to fine leg
shuffles across his stumps and he taps it back to the bowler
gets a nice steepling angle around the off stump, he offers full face of the bat and works it with the line to mid-on
skids through to him  and he gets a thin inside edge onto his pads, the ball falls well short of slip
hits a good length outside off, he opens the face of the bat and steers it to the sweeper on the off side
stays at the crease and taps it down to cover
gets a nice steepling angle around the off stump, he's drawn forward, tapped to point
gives him just a fraction of width outside off and he opens the face of the bat and carves it to third man
hits a good length on off and middle, he walks into the shot and taps it towards the bowler
shapes to drive but he gets an inside edge onto his boot, the ball rolls away past him and they take a quick single
pitches on a goo length and seams away, he attempts a shot and withdraws at the last minute.how do u play those?
lands on a fullish length outside off, he drives to mid-off
hits a good length on middle and leg, he gets behind the line and defends
much fuller length, he closes the face of the bat and works it to mid-on
cramps him for room to score outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
pitches outside leg and really skids through before hitting him on the pads, Zaheer was a little optimistic with the appeal but that was never going to hit the stumps
fullish outside off, he drives to mid-off and that's another good over for India
short of a length outside off stump, Dilshan cuts the ball hard off the back foot but hits it straight to cover point
full ball on off stump, Dilshan drives off the front foot towards cover

caught! Splendid line and length, Munaf pitches short of a length around off stump and seams the ball away from the right-hander off the pitch, Dilshan stands on the back foot and drives inside the line of the ball, it hits the outside edge and Dhoni takes an easy catch
Munaf pitches on a good length around off and slants the ball across the left-hander, Vaas lets it go
good length outside off once again, Vaas lets it go through to Dhoni
pitches on a good length just outside off and goes straight through, Vaas pulls his bat inside the line of the ball, Munaf finishes a wicket maiden
Jayawardene moves across and flicks the ball towards deep midwicket

bowled him!! Harbhajan breaches Vaas' defences in his first over, Harbhajan pitches a fast ball in line with the stumps and skids it straight through, Vaas may have been playing for the offspin for he plays around the line of the ball, it goes between his bat and pad and crashes into the stumps
Kulasekara strides forward and defends on the front foot
Kulasekara moves forward and nudges the ball behidn square for a single
Jayawardene moves forward and defends a flat ball towards midwicket
defended on the front foot
good length delivery and the line is very straight just outside the off stump, Kulasekara gets behind the line and defends towards the off side
short of a length outside off stump, Kulasekara reaches out for it and tries to drive away from the body, the ball hits the outside edge and flies wide of second slip towards third man
Jayawardene leans across his stumps and flicks towards midwicket
Kulasekara gets squared up by a short of a length ball just outside off, the outside edge rolls towards point
terrific shot! It was a length ball on middle stump, Jayawardene picked it up early and swung it over square leg for four
good length on off stump this time, Jayawardene defends on the front foot towards the leg side
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot towards the leg side
huge spin and turn from outside off stump into the right-hander, Kulasekara tried to cut and bottom edged it into the ground
Kulasekara pushes forward and gets an edge towards short third man
Jayawardene moves across his stumps and works the ball behind square
bowled slower on middle and leg, Kulasekara uses the angle into him to nudge the ball behind square for a single
the tossed up delivery draws Jayawardene forward and the ball turns into the right-hander and hits the pad, Harbhajan's getting the ball to bounce
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot towards the off side
good length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
short of a length on off stump, Munaf's giving the batsman no room, Kulasekara pushes the ball with a straight bat to the bowler
short of a length on middle stump, Kulasekara defends the ball towards Munaf
Munaf's length is a little fuller and the line is on middle and leg which allows Kulasekara to whip the ball off his pads to Zaheer at long leg
Jayawardene moves across his stumps and defends towards the leg side
Harbhajan turns the flighted delivery into the right-hander from outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts the ball towards short third man
that's the doosra and the batsman works it on the leg side
tossed up on middle stump, Kulasekara moves forward and drives the ball towards long-on for a single
Jayawardene moves his front pad outside the line of off stump and tries to sweep, he misses and gets hit on the pad, Harbhajan appeals in hope
played with the spin behidn square for a single
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
shot! Jayawardene spots a length ball and lofts Munaf off the front foot straight back over his head for four, excellent execution
good length on middle stump, Jayawardene stays in his crease and nudges the ball towards midwicket
too straight on middle and leg, Jaywardene flicks the ball off his pads towards long leg
Munaf digs in the short ball and bounces Kulasekara who ducks under the ball
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards the bowler
excellent length and the line is wicket to wicket, Kulasekara defends on the front foot towards cover point
Jayawardene strides forward and defends on the front foot
Jayawardene moves forward and closes the face to play the ball to midwicket
Jayawardene moves forward and across and flicks the ball stylishly through midwicket
tossed up slowly outside off stump and the ball turns into Kulasekara who defends on the front foot
Kulasekara moves forward and drives the ball towards long on
full toss on off and middle, Jayawardene moves across and clips the ball off his pads through midwicket
Yuvraj turns the ball a long way away from the right-hander and beats the bat
cut off the back foot to deep point
Kulasekara stays on the back foot and cuts the ball towards point
Kulasekara moves forward and defends a slow ball on the off side
Kulasekara dabs the ball towards backward point and runs the single, the fielder at slip drops to the ground to allow the fielder at point to throw the ball flat to Dhoni
played off the pads behind square
appeal for lbw as Jayawardene moves forward and tries to play across the line, the flighted delivery dips and turns into the right-hander and hits the pad outside the line of off stump
played off the pads behind square for a single
tossed up on off and middle stump, Kulasekara moves forward and nudges the ball behind square
nudged fine towards short third man for a single, Yuvraj runs towards the ball and fires the throw into Dhoni
tossed up on off stump, driven off the front foot towards long off
Jayawardene moves forward and across and drives the ball towards long on
Jayawardene goes back to cut and gets cramped for room, he goes through with the shot and the outside edge flies wide of the fielder at first slip towards the third man boundary
Kulasekara cuts off the back foot towards point
tossed up outside off stump from wide of the crease, Yuvraj is drifting the ball into the right-hander and then turning the ball away from the bat, Kulasekara gets beaten

is Kulasekara run out? He pushed the ball towards point and ran for the single, Jayawardene sent him back, Praveen kumar swooped down on the ball and threw it back to Dhoni, Kulasekara had to dive to make his ground but the throw was poor, it was wide of the stumps and Dhoni took a while to collect and break the stumps, Kulasekara's bat was just over the crease

lbw! Yuvraj fires in the arm ball which angles into the right-hander after pitching outside off, Kulasekara pushes forward and gets hit on the front pad, no doubt that it would have hit the stumps but was the impact on the pad outside the line of off stump? It was a close call.
defended on the leg side
Jayawardene moves forward and across and defends on the leg side
Jayawardene moves his front pad outside the line of off stump and pushes the ball towards mid-on
Harbhajan drifts the ball across the left-hander and spins it away sharply, Thushara lets it go
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Thushara tries to play the big drive but mis-times it towards the bowler
the flighted delivery pitches in line with the stumps and draws Thushara forward, the ball grips the surface and turns across the outside edge of Thushara's front foot defence
tossed up into the right-hander from roudn the wicket, defended on the front foot to the bowler
Jayawardene moves back and cuts the ball to the right of the fielder at short third man
Yuvraj drifts the ball across the left-hander and then spins it back in, Thushara defends on the front foot
Thushara strides forward, covers the line of off stump, and lets the ball go
Thushara gets on to the front foot and pushes the ball towards point
Thushara tries to drive off the front foot but edges a fast ball towards point
pulled off the back foot towards deep square leg
tossed up on middle stump, Thushara defends on the front foot
Thushara gets on to the front foot and pushes the ball towards point
Harbhajan goes roudn the wicket and angles the ball into the left-hander, Thushara defend son the off side
Thushara gets off the mark finally by driving the ball through cover
Jayawardene nudges the ball gently into the gap at midwicket and pushes hard to complete the second
bowled slowly through the air on off and middle, defended back to the bowler
dropped, Thushara moves back and cuts the ball hard, the edge flies quickly to first slip where Sharma can't react quickly enough, the ball hits his hand and bounces over his head
defended on the front foot
Thushara moves forward and plays the ball to point
Thushara moves forward to drive but gets beaten by the turn away from him
Thushara moves back in his crease and cuts a flat ball towards point
Thushara once again pushes forward to defend but the ball drifts into him from round the wicket and then spins away from the bat
defended on the front foot
driven off the front foot through cover
Jayawardene stays in his crease, waits for the ball to turn into him, and opens the face to play the ball to point
played off the pads behind square
short and a bit of width outside off stump, Jayawardene moves back and cuts the ball hard towards wide third man where Gambhir fields
Thushara tries to play on the off side but inside-edges it on to his pad
Thushara tries to go over the top but mis-hits it in the air over the bowler's head, the ball falls safely
Yuvraj slants on to middle and leg, Jayawardene uses the angle to flick the ball towards deep backward square leg
Thushara stays on the back foot and cuts the ball towards point
Jayawardene moves on to the back foot to pull but mis-hits it tamely in the air towards mid-on

Thushara gets down on one knee and powers the slog-sweep through midwicket, he hits that flat and with tremendous force, he places it to the right of the fielder at deep square leg and the ball speeds over the boundary
Jayawardene moves forward and outside the line of off stump to drive the ball towards midwicket
Thushara pushes forward but gets beaten by the turn away from him
did that carry? I don't think it did. Thushara fended at one outside off stump and the edge fell short of Sharma who dived to his right
an attempted defence on the front foot but Thushara gets beaten
swept towards long leg for a single
full toss and Jayawardene drives towards the non-striker, Harbhajan moves across to field and has a small collision with Thushara
driven off the front foot towards long on for a single
Jayawardene clears his front foot out of the way and drives inside out, he doesn't beat the in-field at cover
fired down leg side, that's a wide
Jayawardene backs away and drives the ball but hits it straight to extra cover
Jayawardene moves forward and pushes the ball into the huge gap at midwicket
Jayawardene once again makes room and tries to drive inside out, he doesn't beat the fielder at extra cover
full toss and Jayawardene drives towards long off to keep the strike
played through square leg for a single
Thushara gets down on one knee and sweeps behind square
Jayawardene moves forward and flicks the ball through square leg
bowled straight through outside off stump, Thushara lets it go
a low full toss outside off stump, Thushara moves forward and drives through extra cover
a slow ball outside off stump, Thushara moves back to cut but gets beaten
cut off the back foot towards point
Thushara moves back and cuts a flatter and quicker ball towards point
worked off the back foot towards midwicket
full toss on the stumps, Jayawardene makes room by moving towards leg and slashes the ball through point to Munaf in the deep
super shot! Jayawardene backs away towards leg to make room and lofts the ball crisply inside out into the gap at deep extra cover, Sharma played a couple of those shots earlier today
flicked off the pads through midwicket to retain strike
that's a bit short and Jayawardene rocks back to pull the ball into the vacant spaces at deep  midwicket
short again and this time Jayawardene moves back and pulls the ball towards the fielder at deep square leg
short and wide outside off stump, Thushara frees his arms and cuts through gully, Munaf stops the ball with his boot on the boundary
paddled off the pads towards short fine leg
that's wide outside leg stump and Jayawardene tries to pull the ball, he hits it with the toe end of the bat, it would have been called wide had he missed
nudged off the pads through midwicket
nudged off the back foot towards point
Jayawardene clears his front foot out of the way and swings the ball on the leg side through midwicket
Jayawardene hits the ball behind square and the fielders are deep so the batsmen run the second, these two have now added 50
Jayawardene stands his ground and lofts the ball hard and straight, two more to long-on, he's turning it on now
short ball outside off stump, Jayawardene stays in his crease and pulls the ball towards deep midwicket
bowled flat and wide outside off stump, Thushara moves back to cut but misses
Jayawardene moves forward and pushes the ball towards mid-on

there's a direct hit from backward point! Thushara dabs the ball towards backward point and runs the single, Kohli swoops down on the ball, picks up with his right hand and throws down the stumps at the batsman's end in one fluid motion, Jayawardene is just in
played off the pads towards square leg for single
Thushara tries to drive a slower ball which slants across him, 98 kmh that was, Thushara edges it on the bounce to Dhoni
Jayawardene creates room by moving towards leg and drives the ball inside out towards cover point
Praveen goes round the wicket and angles the ball into the left-hander, Thushara tries to work the ball off his pads but misses
short of a length outside off stump, Jayawardene creates room and cuts the ball towards third man
full ball on off stump, Thushara stays in his crease and drives the ball towards long on for a single

Jayawardene backs away to make room once again, Munaf bowls a short of a length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene frees his arms and cuts the ball over point, Praveen sprints to his right from third man and dives full length to save the boundary
full ball on off stump, Jayawardene drives inside out through cover by making room with an initial movement towards leg

dropped, did that carry? It was a rather high full toss and Thushara tried to pull it off the front foot, he mis-hit it high in the air towards long on, Badrinath came running in off the boundary and mis-timed his dive, he ended up diving over the ball I think, he had taken a similar catch in the last match
Thushara gets hit on the pad for a leg bye to fine leg

Thushara stays in his crease and fends at the ball which angles into him, he gets an inside edge that misses leg stump and runs to the fine-leg boundary, things are beginning to go Sri Lanka's way and they are showing tremendous fight
pushed towards point off the front foot
Thushara works the ball off his pads behind square
Jayawardene moved outside off stump to try and paddle the ball past fine leg, the lien was too far outside off and he ended up swatting it through square leg
Praveen hits Thushara on the pad with one that nips into the left-hander, that was missing leg stump
full ball outside off stump, Jayawardene reaches out and plays it towards point where Kohli moves quickly to his left to prevent the single
bowled full at 130 kmh just outside off stump, Thushara swings and misses
a low full toss on off stump, Thushara hits it off the front foot towards long off

Mahela moves a long way outside the off stump to try and paddle a short of a length ball past the wicketkeeper, he gets a bit of bat on it but doesn't connect properly, Dhoni makes a half stop by moving towards his left
full toss outside off stump and Thushara hits it very hard to the fielder on the point boundary

dropped but an athletic effort, Jayawardene backs away to hit a full toss inside out over extra cover, he doesn't get enough elevation and the timing of Yuvraj's jump is a little off, he jumps high to his right but can't hold on
driven towards mid-off for a single
it's a length delivery on off stump and Thushara lofts the ball over cover, the ball falls short of the fielder running in from the deep
a wayward and wide full toss outside off stump, Jayawardene can't reach that
cut hard off the back foot towards Kohli at point, he fields and throws the ball quickly to Zaheer to prevent the single
Jayawardene backs away to make room and slashes at a short of a length ball, it bounces a bit more and beats the bat
full delivery outside off stump, Jayawardene drives the ball through cover for  a single, Sri Lanka need to find the boundary in this over

bowled him! Zaheer's done it for India! Thushara comes forward to try and drive the ball, Zaheer fires the ball into the block hole and zeroes in on the base of off and middle stump, Thushara doesn't connect and hears the sound of ball hitting stumps
defended on the back foot towards the bowler

full ball outside off stump, Jayawardene backs away and slashes the ball hard past the fielder at point, Harbhajan runs hard to his right from third man and puts in a desperate dive, he manages to slide and keep the ball in play without his body touching the rope, brilliant effort
shot! Jayawardene clears his front foot out of the way and swings across the line, he's connected superbly and dispatches the slower ball high over the midwicket boundary
cut off the back foot through cover point
good length ball on off stump, Mendis defends on the off side, Kapugedera tries to steal the single but Mendis sends him back
Mendis charges and tries to slash a short ball towards third man, he gets beaten, Praveen saw him coming down the pitch and shortened the length
Mendis charges once again but gets beaten by a slower ball
lovely placement and footwork, Jayawardene moves his front foot outside off stump and paddles a full ball from off stump past the fielder at short fine leg, deft touch from Jayawardene

what's happened here? Jayawardene played the ball towards point and Mendis ran for the single from the non-striker's end, he was sent back and the throw came back to Munaf who broke the stumps with Mendis just short of his crease, Doctrove didn't refer it to the third umpire for some reason, I'm not sure the Indians appealed initially, Yuvraj then came up to Dhoni a while later and asked him to ask the umpire to refer it, Dhoni goes up to Doctrove and has a word, he isn't going to refer it
short and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene gets under the ball and cuts in high over point for four

caught! Jayawardene tries to play the paddle shot over short fine leg once again, this time he doesn't connect properly and the ball lobs over the head of Praveen at short fine leg, he runs back and holds a well-judged catch, Jayawardene goes after a terrific innings
full toss on off stump, played towards cover point for a single
driven towards extra cover for  a single
good length ball on middle stump, nudged off the back foot towards midwicket
driven through the infield at cover point, the fielder in the deep is Munaf and he's slow to get to the ball
the slower ball outside off stump and Mendis manages to hit it through midwicket for another single
Murali swings wildly at a length ball and gets a bottom edge that goes towards Dhoni
Murali reaches out for a full ball and drives through the off side
Mendis moves across his stumps and tries to pull a short ball towards fine leg, he misses and the ball goes over his stumps
full ball outside off stump, Murali clears his from foot out of the way and unleashes a haymaker at the ball, he doesn't connect
Murali connects with the pull this time but does not time it will
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
banged in short by Zaheer and Murali tries to play some sort of a hook, he misses again
Zaheer fires the ball into the block hole and Murali digs it out on the off side and sprints for the single, Sri Lanka reach 200
Mendis slogs at a full ball, trying to hit it through the leg side, he gets an inside edge that runs towards fine leg
Mendis backs away and throws his bat at the ball, he slices it towards third man
that might be the end of the game, oh no it isn't! Murali slogs the ball down the ground towards mid-on, Kohli runs in and dives but doesn't quite reach the catch
the slower ball outside off stump, Murali swings and misses
Murali tries to hit a length ball down the ground but mis-times it towards Munaf to stretches out his right hand and fields
full ball outside off stump, Murali gets beaten
that's the end of the game! Munaf bowls it full and straight, Murali clears his front foot out of the way and swings across the line, he misses and Munaf hits middle stump
